DOC.brief_summary: To compare incidence major adverse cardiac event among series patient receive Synergy drug-eluting stent bioabsorbable polymer historical control receive Promus Premier drug-eluting stent durable polymer .
DOC.brief_title: Registry Experience Washington Hospital Center With Drug Eluting Stents - Synergy
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective observational , real-world single-center registry compare incidence major adverse cardiac event among series patient receive Synergy drug-eluting stent bioabsorbable polymer historical control receive Promus Premier drug-eluting stent durable polymer . The investigator hypothesize long-term incidence ( year follow implantation , 4 year ) major adverse cardiovascular event , propensity match stent type , similar Synergy Xience V .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject > 18 year age 2 . Underwent PCI Synergy ( alone ) DES 1 . Underwent PCI nonSynergy DES ( scaffold ) index procedure 2 . Patients take , unable take , dual antiplatelet therapy ( DAPT ) time screen study ( patient discontinue DAPT enrollment include )
